channel.title: Suggestions on a good starter outfit
channel.description: Anyone got suggestions for a good starter outfit? BIG pk server.

item.title: Suggestions on a good starter outfit
item.dc:creator: @Defiance Defiance
item.description:
@Defiance wrote:

Head - Robin Hood Hat
Neck - Fury
Chest - Bronze Platebody
Legs - Bronze Platelegs
Feet - Leather Boots Hands - Leather Gloves
Weapon - Rune Scimitar
Arrows - NONE
Special Item - NONE

That’s what I used to have. Thought maybe you would like it.

Read full topic
item.source: Suggestions on a good starter outfit

playerEquipment[playerRing] = 15082;
